ADD.TITLE: Add the main title
ARTICLE.SAVE: After editing, the content will turn 'Pending' status until a moderator reviews the changes. Are you sure you want to edit it?
BEFORE.START: Before we start, we are going to give you some tips to follow to create quality content.
BIO.NOT.DEFINED: Not Defined. Write something about You
CHOOSE.SUMMARY: The summary will be the first thing the reader see about your content. It appears in the preview before you read it.
CHOOSE.TITLE: Choosing a good title is important, with it a unique link will be created that you can use to share your content.
CREATE.HERE: From here you can create content for Antic's Code . It's very simple, enter the data, write the article and that's it!
EDIT.NOW: Do You want to edit it now?

ACCESS.MESSAGE: Access to this service has been denied for preventing from an unknown origin. Sorry for the inconvenience, if the problem persists, contact us.

CODE.MESSAGE: Sorry, there was a runtime error in the code. Please try to refresh the page if the error continues, otherwise contact us. Sorry for the disturbances.

EMAIL_TOKEN.MESSAGE: The code is invalid. Try again with another code.

REQUEST.MESSAGE: There was an error verifying the data. Please check the entered data and try again. If the problem persists, contact us.

SERVER.MESSAGE: There has been an internal error on the server. If the error continues, please try again later or contact us. Sorry for the disturbances.

SHARE.MESSAGE: We are sorry. This device doesn't support the Web API Share. Please try again with another device, this usually works on mobile devices.

TOKEN.MESSAGE: Your token to access Antic's Code has expired, but do not worry, we have updated it for you. You can continue using the page as always.

UNKNOWN.MESSAGE: We don't know yet but something bad happened. Sorry for the inconvenience, if the problem persists, contact us.

USER_ALREADY.MESSAGE: We are sorry, this email is already in use. Please use another one.

WEB.MESSAGE: There seems to be a network error. Check that you have Internet access and try again. If the problem persists, contact us.

INTRO.FIVE: If you don't know where to start, review content already created.
INTRO.FOUR: Remember to use everything Markdown offers, lists, quotes ...
INTRO.ONE: You need to know Markdown since we use this format.
INTRO.THREE: Try to write the best you can, we do not correct mistakes
INTRO.TWO: Be familiar with the topic you are writing about

I.KNOW.MARKDOWN: I have read and understood that I know Markdown as much as to write content
INAPPROPIATE: I accept that if I write content that is not allowed or inappropriate, it could be deleted
INDEX.SUBTITLE: Index subtitle
INDEX.TITLE: Index title
INDEX.USE: The index helps the reader navigate between the main sections of the content.
LEVELS.NAME: Difficulty
LINK.NAME: Link Name
LINK.TITLE: Link name
LINKS.USE: If you add links they will appear at the end of the content. They are usually external links to complement.
MAX.LENGTH: Size too large, please try another photo. Sorry for the inconvenient.
NO.EDITED: You haven't edited anything, saving now is pointless.
SAVE.NOW: Do You want to save it?

CREATE.FIFTH: Raise your position in the ranking by creating content. The top awaits you
CREATE.FIRST: Follow this quick tutorial and learn how you can start writing content
CREATE.FOURTH: Meet new people who like the same thing as you. Programming!
CREATE.SECOND: Don't let your amazing ideas and knowledge escape from you. Portray them on Antic's!
CREATE.SIXTH: Access, edit, save and share your content quickly and easily
CREATE.THIRD: Any content you create will go directly to the cloud. Without worries

SURE.EXIT: Are You sure You want to leave?
TAG.REPEAT: It seems that you have repeated a label. Don't worry, we've handled it for you.
THIS.DRAFT: Remember this is only a draft
TITLE: Title

TOOLTIP.CATEGORY: Pick a category. It depends later on where the content is located.
TOOLTIP.INDEX: Adding an index helps readers navigate more comfortably in the content.
TOOLTIP.INDEX.USAGE:
Each of the indexes is a stylized <h2> element. Take a look at the preview with the button that appears when you add one.
Also when you create the message, we will add these indexes for you.
TOOLTIP.LEVELS: Choose a difficulty level for the content. If you have doubts, consult a moderator.
TOOLTIP.LINKS: Links serve to complement your content. Although they are not mandatory, we do recommend them.
TOOLTIP.MESSAGE:
The message is the most important part of the content. Don't worry and take your time.
The message is saved every 20 seconds.
TOOLTIP.TAGS: Choose several tags related to the content. You can pick a maximum of 3
